developer_token.description: Developer token granted by Google to use their APIs. More instruction on how to find this value in our docs

client_id.description: Google client id. More instruction on how to find this value in our docs

client_secret.description: Google client secret. More instruction on how to find this value in our docs

refresh_token.description: Refresh token generated using developer_token, oauth_client_id, and oauth_client_secret. More instruction on how to find this value in our docs

start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25. Any data before this date will not be replicated.

customer_id.description: Customer id must be specified as a 10-digit number without dashes. More instruction on how to find this value in our docs

conversion_window_days.description: Define the historical replication start date. Change this setting if you want to replicate data beyond Google Adsâ€™s default setting of 14 days.
